text:
@glennkirschner2 If you are the White House physician, don't you have to explain to the medical board why you prescribed a drug for uses beyond what the FDA has approved?
This drug is only to be used for positive COVID-19 patients in a clinical trial...not "just because."

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court
